data.title: Perkins Coie Represents Rentrak in its $98 Million Acquisition of Kantar Mediaâs U.S. Television Measurement Business
data.meta_description: Perkins Coie represented Rentrak Corporation (NASDAQ:RENT), the entertainment and marketing industriesâ premier provider of worldwide consumer viewership information, in connection with its $98 million acquisition of the U.S. television measurement business of WPPâs Kantar business unit and related $56 million private placement of Rentrakâs common stock.
data.text:
PORTLAND, Ore. (October 13, 2014) - Perkins Coie represented Rentrak Corporation (NASDAQ:RENT), the entertainment and marketing industries’ premier provider of worldwide consumer viewership information, in connection with its $98 million acquisition of the U.S. television measurement business of WPP’s Kantar business unit and related $56 million private placement of Rentrak’s common stock. Kantar, one of the world's largest insight, information and consultancy groups, provides business insights at all points of the consumer cycle to over half of the Fortune 500 companies.

Led by Portland partner John Thomas and counsel Darren Nakata, the Perkins Coie team also included Seattle partners Carl Crow and Tom Cristy, Denver partner Pete Kinsella and Portland associate Brian Schlect.

Perkins Coie is a leading global law firm, dedicated to helping the world’s most innovative companies solve the legal and business challenges of tomorrow. Learn about our work and values here.
